name: Living Space (Sanoke, Tay Guo Qiang, vnbear, helloqx)
name_original: Living Space (Sanoke, Tay Guo Qiang, vnbear, helloqx)
description:
Humanity's attempt to make contact with extraterrestrial life has resulted in their destruction when aliens responded to signals sent out in space. You survived the previous alien invasion by fleeing Earth when it happened.

Now, aliens are invading your new home planet... will you survive the next alien invasions?

Instructions:

Move with arrow keys or WASD, fire with spacebar.

Default difficulty is normal. To toggle Easy Mode on or off, press the 'Easy Mode' button. 'Easy Mode' button being set to white indicates that Easy Mode is on.
